summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Coe Place, from Fourteenth Avenue South to Atlantic Street; Fifteenth Avenue South, from Atlantic Street to Grand Street, all in the City of Seattle, by regrading, curbing and constructing concrete sidewalks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No.2006 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
